title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.4 - Additional documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.4 - Additional documents

State Regulations

The following additional documents shall be submitted to
the Superintendent as they become available to the parties: (a) Copies of all approvals obtained pursuant
to Federal law and regulations. (b) Opinion of counsel for each party to the merger as to compliance of that party
with all requirements of Federal and State law in connection with the
merger. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
110.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
